title: The Talk - Megan Fox on Son, Noah, Being 'laughed' at for Wearing Dresses to School
text: Thursday on "The Talk" Megan Fox discusses her six-year-old son Noah loving fashion and wearing dresses. "He's really into fashion. He's the one, like sometimes, he'll dress himself and he likes to wear dresses, sometimes. And I send him to a really liberal, like hippy school. But even there, here in California, he still has little boys going like, 'Boys don't wear dresses,' or 'Boys don't wear pink,' says Fox. "We're going through that now, where I'm trying to teach him to be confident no matter what anyone else says. He had stopped wearing dresses for a while. He just wore one two days ago to school, and he came home and I was like, 'How was it? Did any of the friends at school have anything to say?' And he was like, 'Well, all the boys laughed when I came in,' but he's like, 'I don't care, I love dresses too much.'"
